original_title: Claude Sautet : le calme et la dissonance
overview: Claude Sautet (1924-2000), the filmmaker of human emotions, portrayed everyday life in France in the 1970s and 1980s in a unique way, thanks to the creation of very real characters and plausible situations, thus becoming one of the most beloved French directors of his time.
title: Claude Sautet: A Subtle Director
